languages.text: {n}Сквозь пробоины в броне вы можете лучше разглядеть внутренности механизма — брюхо его явно способно раскрываться, чтобы втянуть в себя искалеченную жертву. Там, в плену "желудка" твари, в нее вопьются инъекторы, которые превратят пленника в жидкость и высосут через прозрачные трубки в резервуары в хвостовой части монстра.{/n}

{n}You can clearly see the inside of the mechanism through the holes in its armour. Its gut can open to drag a hamstrung victim inside. Once the victim finds themselves in the monster's "stomach," they will be pierced by injectors that will liquefy them. The substance will then drain to the reservoirs at the tail end of the creature.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сквозь пробоины в броне вы можете лучше разглядеть внутренности механизма — брюхо его явно способно раскрываться, чтобы втянуть в себя искалеченную жертву. Там, в плену "желудка" твари, в нее вопьются инъекторы, которые превратят пленника в жидкость и высосут через прозрачные трубки в резервуары в хвостовой части монстра.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You can clearly see the inside of the mechanism through the holes in its armour. Apparently its gut can open to drag the hamstrung victim inside. Once it finds itself in the monster's "stomach", it will be pierced by the injectors that will reduce the prisoner to liquid and drain it to the reservoirs at the tail end of the creature.{/n}

{n}You can clearly see the inside of the mechanism through the holes in its armour. Apparently its gut can open to drag the hamstrung victim inside. Once it finds itself in the monster's "stomach", it will be pierced by the injectors that will reduce the prisoner to liquid and drain it to the reservoirs at the tail end of the creature.{/n}

{n}You can clearly see the inside of the mechanism through the holes in its armour. Apparently its gut can open to drag the hamstrung victim inside. Once it finds itself in the monster's "stomach", it will be pierced by the injectors that will reduce the prisoner to liquid and drain it to the reservoirs at the tail end of the creature.{/n}

Once it finds itself in the monster's "stomach", it will be pierced by the injectors that will reduce the prisoner to liquid and drain it to the reservoirs at the tail end of the creature.{/n}

Once the victim finds themselves in the monster's "stomach," they will be pierced by injectors that will liquify them. The substance will then drain to the reservoirs at the tail end of the creature.{/n}

Once the victim finds themselves in the monster's "stomach," they will be pierced by injectors that will liquify them. Once the victim finds themselves in the monster's "stomach," they will be pierced by injectors that will liquefy them. The substance will then drain to the reservoirs at the tail end of the creature.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アーマーの穴からメカニズム内部がよく見える。どうやら腸が開いて、首を絞められた犠牲者を中に引きずり込むことができるようだ。いったん怪物の『胃』の中に入ると、液化させる注射器で貫かれ、生き物の尾端にある貯水池に排出される。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can clearly see the inside of the mechanism through the holes in its armour. Its gut can open to drag a hamstrung victim inside. Once the victim finds themselves in the monster's "stomach," they will be pierced by injectors that will liquefy them. The substance will then drain to the reservoirs at the tail end of the creature.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アーマーの穴からメカニズム内部がよく見える。どうやら腸が開いて、首を絞められた犠牲者を中に引きずり込むことができるようだ。いったん怪物の『胃』の中に入ると、液化させる注射器で貫かれ、生き物の尾端にある貯水池に排出される。{/n}

languages.text: {n}通过装甲上的洞，你清楚地看到了这台机器的内部结构。它的内部是可以打开的，可以将失去反抗能力的受害者拖入体内。当受害者进入怪物的“胃部”之后，就会被注射器刺穿，随后全身融为液体，储藏在怪物尾部的储存器中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can clearly see the inside of the mechanism through the holes in its armour. Its gut can open to drag a hamstrung victim inside. Once the victim finds themselves in the monster's "stomach," they will be pierced by injectors that will liquefy them. The substance will then drain to the reservoirs at the tail end of the creature.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}通过装甲上的洞，你清楚地看到了这台机器的内部结构。很显然，它的内部是可以打开的，可以将失去防抗能力的受害者拖入体内。当受害者进入怪物的“胃部”之后，就会被注射器刺穿，随后全身融为液体，储藏在怪物尾部的储存器中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Puedes ver claramente el interior del mecanismo a través de los agujeros de su armadura. Sus entrañas pueden abrirse para arrastrar a la víctima lisiada al interior. Una vez se encuentre en el «estómago» del monstruo, será atravesada por los inyectores, que licuan al prisionero. La sustancia resultante se drena hacia los depósitos situados en la cola de la criatura.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can clearly see the inside of the mechanism through the holes in its armour. Its gut can open to drag a hamstrung victim inside. Once the victim finds themselves in the monster's "stomach," they will be pierced by injectors that will liquefy them. The substance will then drain to the reservoirs at the tail end of the creature.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Puedes ver claramente el interior del mecanismo a través de los agujeros de su armadura. Al parecer, sus tripas pueden abrirse para arrastrar a la víctima encorvada hacia el interior. Una vez que esta se encuentre en el «estómago» del monstruo, será atravesada por los inyectores que reducirán al prisionero a líquido y lo drenarán hacia los depósitos situados en la cola de la criatura.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du siehst durch die Löcher in der Rüstung ganz klar in das Innere des Mechanismus. Offenbar kann man ihn öffnen, um das gelähmte Opfer darin zu platzieren. Sobald sich das Opfer im "Bauch" des Monsters befindet, wird es von Injektoren durchbohrt, die es verflüssigen. Anschließend wird die Substanz in die Reservoire am Schwanz der Kreatur geleitet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can clearly see the inside of the mechanism through the holes in its armour. Its gut can open to drag a hamstrung victim inside. Once the victim finds themselves in the monster's "stomach," they will be pierced by injectors that will liquefy them. The substance will then drain to the reservoirs at the tail end of the creature.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du siehst durch die Löcher in der Rüstung ganz klar in das Innere des Mechanismus. Offenbar kann man ihren unteren Teil öffnen, um das bewegungsunfähige Opfer hineinzuzerren. Wenn es sich im "Bauch" des Monsters befindet, wird es von den Injektoren gestochen, die den Gefangenen in Flüssigkeit verwandeln und diese in das Reservoir am hinteren Ende der Kreatur ableiten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À travers les trous de son armure, vous pouvez parfaitement voir l'intérieur du mécanisme qui anime la créature. Elle est capable d'ouvrir ses entrailles pour y enfermer ses victimes paralysées qui, une fois dans son « estomac », sont transpercées par des injecteurs jusqu'à être réduites à l'état de liquide qui vient ensuite alimenter les réservoirs à l'arrière de la créature.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can clearly see the inside of the mechanism through the holes in its armour. Its gut can open to drag a hamstrung victim inside. Once the victim finds themselves in the monster's "stomach," they will be pierced by injectors that will liquefy them. The substance will then drain to the reservoirs at the tail end of the creature.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À travers les trous de son armure, vous pouvez parfaitement voir l'intérieur du mécanisme qui anime la créature. Il semblerait qu'elle puisse ouvrir ses entrailles pour y enfermer ses victimes paralysées qui, une fois dans l'estomac, se font transpercer par des injecteurs jusqu'à être réduites à l'état de liquide qui vient ensuite alimenter les réservoirs à l'arrière de la créature.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zırhındaki deliklerden mekanizmanın içini açıkça görebiliyorsun. Karnı açılıp hareketsiz bırakılmış kurbanını içine çekebiliyor gibi. Kurban, kendisini canavarın "midesinde" bulduktan sonra enjektörlerle deline deline sıvılaştırılıyor. Bu madde daha sonra yaratığın arka kısmındaki hazneye çekiliyormuş gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can clearly see the inside of the mechanism through the holes in its armour. Its gut can open to drag a hamstrung victim inside. Once the victim finds themselves in the monster's "stomach," they will be pierced by injectors that will liquefy them. The substance will then drain to the reservoirs at the tail end of the creature.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zırhındaki deliklerden mekanizmanın içini açıkça görebiliyorsun. Karnı açılabiliyor ve hareketsiz bırakılmış kurbanını içine çekebiliyor gibi. Kurban, kendisini canavarın "midesinde" bulduktan sonra, enjektörlerle deline deline sıvılaştırılıyor ve madde daha sonra yaratığın arka kısmındaki hazneye çekiliyor gibi görünüyor.{/n}
